Posts.Content: Aug 25, 2013 10:33AM notsostepfordwife wrote: I know how you feel and after finding out yesterday I have bone mets it's stll alot to take in. I am alone out of town in hospital. We are aloud crap days. It's hard when our kids go away, I don't know if we every really see them as grown up? I have one son 20 and one 14 and I still buy school clothes and wonder how in the world am I buying stuff so big? I don't feel like I can truly vent to friends or family (I seem to need to reassure them) but on here it's different and feel like I can be honest. I am thinking of you.
Posts.Title: Sorry to vent - just need to get the pity out blondie1 MartyMart

Posts.Content: Feb 25, 2014 09:33PM notsostepfordwife wrote: Hi, I was in terrible pain from mets to spine. The doctor put me on morphine but I only took them a few weeks and since have taken cannabis oil every day. The pain is gone and I sleep so much better.

Posts.Content: Aug 27, 2013 03:44PM notsostepfordwife wrote: Hi Elm, as I just found out a few days ago, I am in the same boat and waiting for a bone biopsy. Today they came in and said it may be in my bile duct or gallbladder as well. I was eight yrs free so totally understand your numbness. We have kids close in age and will be here for them for years to come. hugs.
